alert.note: Alert for Rensselaer; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 5:07AM EST until December 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hoosic River at Eagle Bridge. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage. Water on County Route 103 between Route 67 and the covered bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 5.7 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hoosic River Eagle Bridge Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Tue 5 am: 12.6 Forecast: Tue 7 am 12.4 Tue 1 pm 11.0 Tue 7 pm 10.0 Wed 1 am 9.1 Wed 7 am 8.4 Wed 1 pm 7.9 Wed 7 pm 7.5 Thu 1 am 7.0 Thu 7 am 6.6 Thu 1 pm 6.2 Thu 7 pm 6.0 Fri 1 am 5.7 &&
